{{tt|std::chrono::file_clock}} is an alias for the clock used for {{lc|std::filesystem::file_time_type}}. Its epoch is unspecified.

{{tt|file_clock}} meets the {{named req|TrivialClock}} requirements.

{{cpp/chrono/clock time point family}}
{{cpp/chrono/clock member types}}
{{cpp/chrono/clock is steady}}

===Member functions===
{{tt|file_clock}} provides exactly one of the following two pairs of static member functions:
* {{tt|to_utc}} and {{tt|from_utc}}; or
* {{tt|to_sys}} and {{tt|from_sys}}.

{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc inc|1=cpp/chrono/file_clock/dsc now}}
{{dsc inc|1=cpp/chrono/file_clock/dsc to_from_utc}}
{{dsc inc|1=cpp/chrono/file_clock/dsc to_from_sys}}
{{dsc end}}
